channel.title: Gin Blossoms on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Gin Blossoms on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Congratulations I’m Sorry
item.description: “Do you think it’d be all right if I could just crash here tonight?” The introduction to “Hey Jealousy,” the 1992 song by the Gin Blossoms, introduces a lackadaisical ne’er-do-well, one who laments the loss of an old relationship while asking his ex for a place to ward off his hangover, because he has nowhere else to go. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ah5gAkna3jI Unlike Nirvana or Pearl Jam, the darkness of the lyrics wasn’t matched by a darkness in the melody—the tune, in fact, had more in common with a melodic tune from R.
